# [Story] ORB-049: Build template library

## Parent Epic

Parent: #517 (Epic 3.5: Content Library)

## Description

Build a template library for saving and reusing post templates across different platforms with variable placeholder support.

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Save posts as reusable templates
- [ ] Platform-specific template variants
- [ ] Variable placeholders (e.g., {{product_name}}, {{date}})
- [ ] Quick insert from template into Content Composer
- [ ] Template categories and search functionality

## Technical Notes

- Use Handlebars or similar for placeholder syntax
- Store templates with preview thumbnails
- Implement template inheritance for brand consistency
